//
//
//
//
//
//
//
//
//
//
 
import abstractButton from '../internal/abstractButton'
import icon from '../icon'
import {isNotNull, convertClass} from '../utils'
export default {
  name: 'mu-tab',
  props: {
    icon: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    iconClass: {
      type: [String, Object, Array]
    },
    title: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    titleClass: {
      type: [String, Object, Array]
    },
    href: {
      type: String
    },
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean
    },
    value: {}
  },
  computed: {
    active () {
      return isNotNull(this.value) && this.$parent.value === this.value
    },
    textClass () {
      const {icon, titleClass} = this
      let classNames = []
      if (icon) classNames.push('has-icon')
      return classNames.concat(convertClass(titleClass))
    }
  },
  methods: {
    tabClick (e) {
      if (this.$parent.handleTabClick) this.$parent.handleTabClick(this.value, this)
      this.$emit('click', e)
    }
  },
  watch: {
    active (val, oldVal) {
      if (val === oldVal) return
      if (val) this.$emit('active')
    }
  },
  components: {
    'abstract-button': abstractButton,
    icon
  }
}
 
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Wed Dec 14 2016 19:17:53 GMT+0800 (CST)
